whatIsLtr.title: What is LPR?
whatIsLtr.content: LPR (Lightning Pickleball Rating) is a proprietary skill assessment system developed exclusively for the Lightning Pickleball community. LPR is calculated based on the ELO algorithm applied to all public lightning match results, showing your growth journey in an intuitive scale from 1 to 10. It's an honorable indicator of how much you've grown within our ecosystem.

relationToNtrp.title: Relationship to NTRP
relationToNtrp.content: LPR is a unique system distinct from USTA's NTRP. For the convenience of users familiar with NTRP ratings, you can select your skill level in a range similar to NTRP when signing up, but all official levels calculated and displayed within the app are based on LPR.
